content: AdTheorent's data-driven approach to advertising is well suited for this expansion because we are able to leverage our data and machine learning to connect the dots between search and social investments and programmatic media, inform our programmatic media buying with search and social data and capture a larger percentage of customers' media budgets. Adjusted gross profit, which is a non-GAAP metric that removes traffic acquisition-related platform operations costs was $24.7 million in the third quarter or 65.8% of revenue compared to 64.6% in the third quarter of 2021. That there was a gap in the market and a gap in the capability set that we believe we have filled by accessing and licensing, key data sets that we can use health claims data and data about from pharmacies and other just first and source data that we can use to create a very valuable foundational data targeting layers for our machine learning programmatic platform so that we don't have to target users based on inferences about their health condition.
